      • getCollaborator

        public Collaborator getCollaborator​(java.lang.String email)
        Parameters:
        email - mail address of the collaborator looked for
        Returns:
        the collaborator having the mail address corresponding to the one given in parameter. If there is no user with this mail address, it returns an exception.

      • getMember

        public Member getMember​(java.lang.String mail)
        Parameters:
        mail - mail address of the member looked for?
        Returns:
        the member having the mail address given in parameter. IF there is not any member with this mail address in the project, it return an exception.

      • broadcastToMembers

        public void broadcastToMembers​(Collaborator sender,
                               java.util.Collection<Collaborator> receivers)
        Send a notification to all the collaborators once someone modifies the project.
        Parameters:
        sender - collaborator who modified something in a project, and broadcasts a modifications to all the other collaborators
        receivers - All the collaborators who are going to receive the notification related to the project modification
